Rulings.Base:
1. You use this effect during your Main Phase. It starts a Chain and targets the face-up "T.G." Synchro Monster.
2. The monster you target only has to be face-up on your side of the field when the effect is activated.
3. You can target a "T.G." Synchro Monster that did not use Synchro Monsters as Synchro Material Monsters. If you do, it is sent to the GY and you Special Summon nothing.
4. Sending the target to the GY and Special Summoning the Synchro Monsters do not happen at the same time.

PSCT.Base:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
Once per turn: You can target 1 other "T.G." Synchro Monster you control; send it to the Graveyard, then, if all the Synchro Monsters that were used for its Synchro Summon are in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon all of them.
